questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
What is the correct HTML element for creating a numbered list?
Which HTML element is used for creating a table?
What is the correct way to comment out multiple lines of code in HTML?
Which HTML tag is used for creating a form?
What is the purpose of the HTML <head> element?
options: To display the main content of the page
To define the structure of the page
To store metadata and link to external resources
questions.correctAnswer: To store metadata and link to external resources

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to create a line break?
Which HTML tag is used to define an unordered list?
What is the purpose of the HTML <meta> element?
options: To display images on the page
To provide metadata about the document
questions.correctAnswer: To provide metadata about the document

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used for creating a hyperlink to an email address?
What does the HTML <iframe> element allow you to do?
options: Embed external content like videos or maps
Style text with different fonts and colors
questions.correctAnswer: Embed external content like videos or maps

What is the purpose of the HTML <aside> element?
options: To create a footer for the page
To define a section of the page that is separate from the main content
To format text with a different font
questions.correctAnswer: To define a section of the page that is separate from the main content
